show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Mickey Huff in studio with Peter Phillips review the NEW award-winning documentary “Project Censored the Movie: Ending... <!--more--> the Reign of Junk Food News” AND newly released interview outtakes with Howard Zinn and Noam Chomsky talking about Project Censored, war, history, and the media.
These are only available to the general public here and now for the first time!
